channel.title: Storms on the Horizon: 100 Kingdom Events (Part 2)
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I offer the second half of a list of events to spice up happenings in your grand-scale rpg ( *Legacy, Godbound, Kingdom* , etc), each with questions to flesh them out. There's a link to a pdf with both parts. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/storms-on-the-horizon-100-kingdom-events-part-two

item.title: Storms on the Horizon: 100 Kingdom Events (Part 2)

THE GAUNTLET

Storms on the Horizon: 100 Kingdom Events (Part Two)

This is the second half of a foreboding list of incidents, changes, and catastrophes you can use to populate the background of your TTRPG campaign. You'll find Part One here . While these are written...
